about_the_game:
In the neon - shrouded cybercity of Aurede, you step into the shoes of Jill, a novice bartender, and take over a bar that harbors earth - shattering secrets. Here, every glass of liquor is a code that can rewrite reality, and every customer is an embodiment of system glitches: cadets from Tolz Military Academy cough up blue data fluid, the experimental props of quantum physicists gnaw at time and space, and the wounds of the hunters reveal millennial holy stigmata... And the glass you're wiping reflects the record of the 17th personality overwrite in your mechanical red pupils.

"Welcome to EΨsium. Your drink will determine whether this virtual world can survive for another 47 seconds – or ushers in the first dawn of a new era."

In this cyberpunk-themed linear visual novel, you take on the role of Jill the bartender during a 14-day time loop. While crafting drinks for customers is part of your job, the true challenge lies in unraveling the dark secrets hidden beneath this neon-lit world.

content_descriptors.notes: It contains direct descriptions of drinking, fighting and other behaviors, and contains certain cartoon violence. It also includes a certain amount of revealing clothing.All characters are over 18 years old.

And the glass you're wiping reflects the record of the 17th personality overwrite in your mechanical red pupils.

"Welcome to EΨsium. Your drink will determine whether this virtual world can survive for another 47 seconds – or ushers in the first dawn of a new era."

In this cyberpunk-themed linear visual novel, you take on the role of Jill the bartender during a 14-day time loop. While crafting drinks for customers is part of your job, the true challenge lies in unraveling the dark secrets hidden beneath this neon-lit world.
name: 极乐世界（Elysium）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
